about.title: About Me
text: I am an enthusiastic and highly motivated undergraduate student majoring in Computer Information Systems at W. P. Carey School of Business. I firmly believe that technology can solve major problems that humankind is facing today and I am keen on making a difference solving them.
At the moment, I'm looking for a summer 2020 internship as a software engineer. I'm particularly interested in working on Cloud based solutions and IoT devices.

project_list.title: BookWorm
description: BookWorm is a web application that allows you to record own thoughts on the book you are reading. It lets you never forget what the book is about and what you noted as important from reading it.
